hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Prelude of Light#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #2# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Big Poe Bottle#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Big Poe Bottle#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #a Small Key#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Prelude of Light#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Hammer Room Switch Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Minuet of Forest#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path to #Evil's Bane#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Goron Shop#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Slingshot#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #an Ice Trap# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Mirror Shield#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Mirror Shield#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Deku Tree Compass#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs #Saria's House#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Deku Tree Compass#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: Hi @, we've been trying to reach you about your horse's extended warranty.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #1# major item.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Minuet of Forest#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Bow#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Right Central Chest

ToT (Left).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #a Green Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #a Huge Rupee# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #the Kokiri Sword#.
